# The `FunctionLoweringInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionloweringinfo">FunctionLoweringInfo</a> - This contains information that is global to a function that is used when lowering a region of the function. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionloweringinfo">FunctionLoweringInfo</a> - This contains information that is global to a function that is used when lowering a region of the function.

Definition at line 57 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/functionloweringinfo-h">FunctionLoweringInfo.h</a>.

### VirtReg2Value {#adc73312d3b0c4b5a5b4b1789c72ae94c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;Register, const Value&#42;&gt; llvm::FunctionLoweringInfo::VirtReg2Value</>}>
VirtReg2Value map is needed by the Divergence Analysis driven instruction selection.

It is reverted <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemap">ValueMap</a>. It is computed in lazy style - on demand. It is used to get the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> corresponding to the live in virtual register and is called from the TargetLowerinInfo::isSDNodeSourceOfDivergence.
